import React from "react" import { Card, CardHeader, CardBody, CardTitle, TabContent, TabPane, Nav, NavItem, NavLink } from "reactstrap" import classnames from "classnames" import { Eye, Code } from "react-feather" import { navBorder } from "./NavComponentSourceCode" class NavBorder extends React.Component { state = { activeTab: "1" } toggleTab = tab => { if (this.state.activeTab !== tab) { this.setState({ activeTab: tab }) } } render() { return ( With Border

Use Class .wrap-border with your nav tag to wrap your nav with a border
